message: Let's split the money reasonably. I believe this is a fair offer considering I get to propose first.
Alice, your offer was a bit too one-sided. Let's be fair, this is a more balanced split.
Bob, let's be realistic. Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. This is my counter-proposal, and it's more in line with a fair split considering the time pressure.
Alice, we are running out of time! This back and forth is pointless. Let's just split it evenly and get out of here.
